verses.verse: Listen<WH238> to my prayer,<WH8605> God.<WH430> Don't<WH5956> hide yourself from my supplication.<WH8467>
Attend<WH7181> to me,<WH6030> and answer me.<WH7300> I am restless in my complaint,<WH7879> and moan,<WH1949>

Because of the voice<WH6963> of the enemy,<WH341> Because<WH6440> of the oppression<WH6125> of the wicked.<WH7563> For they bring<WH4131> suffering<WH205> on me.<WH639> In anger they hold a grudge against me.<WH7852>
My heart<WH3820> is severely pained<WH2342> within<WH7130> me.<WH367> The terrors of death<WH4194> have fallen on me.<WH5307>
Fearfulness<WH3374> and trembling<WH7461> have come<WH935> on me.<WH6427> Horror has overwhelmed me.<WH3680>
I said,<WH559> "Oh that<WH5414> I had wings<WH83> like a dove!<WH3123> Then I would fly away,<WH5774> and be at rest.<WH7931>
Behold,<WH5074> then I would wander far off.<WH7368> I would lodge<WH3885> in the wilderness.<WH4057>" Selah.<WH5542>
"I would hurry<WH2363> to a shelter<WH4655> from the stormy<WH5584> wind<WH7307> and storm.<WH5584>"
Confuse<WH1104> them,<WH136> Lord, and confound<WH6385> their language,<WH3956> for I have seen<WH7200> violence<WH2555> and strife<WH7379> in the city.<WH5892>
Day<WH3119> and night<WH3915> they prowl around<WH5437> on its walls.<WH2346> Malice<WH205> and abuse<WH5999> are also within her.<WH7130>
Destructive<WH1942> forces are within<WH7130> her.<WH8496> Threats and lies<WH4820> don't<WH4185> depart from her streets.<WH7339>

For it was not an enemy<WH341> who insulted<WH2778> me,<WH5375> then I could have endured it.<WH8130> Neither was it he who hated me who raised<WH1431> himself up against me,<WH5641> then I would have hidden myself from him.
But it was you,<WH582> a man like<WH6187> me,<WH441> my companion, and my familiar friend.<WH3045>
We took sweet<WH4985> fellowship<WH5475> together.<WH3162> We walked<WH1980> in God<WH430>'s house<WH1004> with company.<WH7285>
Let death<WH4194> come suddenly<WH5377> on them.<WH3381> Let them go down alive<WH2416> into Sheol.<WH7585> For wickedness<WH7451> is in their dwelling,<WH4033> in their midst.<WH7130>
As for me,<WH7121> I will call on God.<WH430> Yahweh<WH3068> will save me.<WH3467>
Evening,<WH6153> morning,<WH1242> and at noon,<WH6672> I will cry<WH7878> out in distress.<WH1993> He will hear<WH8085> my voice.<WH6963>
He has redeemed<WH6299> my soul<WH5315> in peace<WH7965> from the battle<WH7128> that was against me,<WH7227> although there are many who oppose me.
God,<WH410> who is enthroned<WH3427> forever,<WH6924> will hear,<WH8085> and answer<WH6030> them.<WH5542> Selah. They never change,<WH2487> who don't<WH3372> fear God.<WH430>
He raises<WH7971> his hands<WH3027> against his friends.<WH7965> He has violated<WH2490> his covenant.<WH1285>
His mouth<WH6310> was smooth<WH2505> as butter,<WH4260> but his heart<WH3820> was war.<WH7128> His words<WH1697> were softer<WH7401> than oil,<WH8081> yet they were drawn swords.<WH6609>
Cast<WH7993> your burden<WH3053> on Yahweh,<WH3068> and he will sustain<WH3557> you.<WH5769> He will never allow<WH5414> the righteous<WH6662> to be moved.<WH4131>

But you,<WH430> God, will bring them down<WH3381> into the pit<WH875> of destruction.<WH7845> Bloodthirsty<WH1818> and deceitful<WH4820> men<WH582> shall not live out half<WH2673> their days,<WH3117> but I will trust in you.<WH982>
